name: Boby's land
description:
Boby's land is a adventure-platformer game. Only one color at a time. Activating a switch will display switch's color block. So be careful where you're going.

Made with Haxe and Heaps for the LowRezJam 2016. For graphics, I've used pico 8's color palette. Each tile is 8x8 (with a x2 zoom).

[R to restart]
